articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: JSW Steel maintains shipments to Europe without passing on export tax cost
articles.description: JSW Steel Ltd, will continue to supply products to its buyers in Europe without passing on any increase in costs despite New Delhi's decision to impose an export tax, a senior company official said on Monday.
